::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tsibble, feasts, fable, seasonal)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data <- read_csv("visitor_arrivals_by_air.csv")
```
:::


### Conventional base ts object versus tibble object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data$'Month-Year' <- dmy(
  ts_data$ 'Month-Year'
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

ts_data_ts <- ts(ts_data)

:::
:::


### tsibble object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_tsibble <- ts_data %>%
  mutate(Month = yearmonth(`Month-Year`)) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = `Month`)
```
:::



## Visualising Time-series Data
### Visualising single time-series: ggplot2 methods


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ts_longer <- ts_data %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(2:34),
               names_to = "Country",
               values_to = "Arrivals")
ts_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Taiwan") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
             y = Arrivals))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Plotting multiple time-series data with ggplot2 methods



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = ts_longer, 
       aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
           y = Arrivals,
           color = Country))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", 
        legend.box.spacing = unit(0.5, "cm"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell ecoho='false'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = ts_longer, 
       aes(x = `Month-Year`, 
           y = Arrivals))+
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~ Country,
             ncol = 3,
             scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
```
:::


## Visual Analysis of Time-series Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer <- ts_tsibble %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(2:34),
               names_to = "Country",
               values_to = "Arrivals")
```
:::


### Visual Analysis of Seasonality with Seasonal Plot


::: {.cell ecoho='false'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Italy" |
         Country == "Vietnam" |
         Country == "United Kingdom" |
         Country == "Germany") %>% 
  gg_season(Arrivals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


###  Visual Analysis of Seasonality with Cycle Plot



::: {.cell ecoho='false'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam" |
         Country == "Italy") %>% 
  autoplot(Arrivals) + 
  facet_grid(Country ~ ., scales = "free_y")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell ecoho='false'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam" |
         Country == "Italy") %>% 
  gg_subseries(Arrivals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Time series decomposition
### Single time series decomposition


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  PACF(Arrivals) %>% 
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Multiple time-series decomposition


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam" |
         `Country` == "Italy" |
         `Country` == "United Kingdom" |
         `Country` == "China") %>%
  ACF(Arrivals) %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam" |
         `Country` == "Italy" |
         `Country` == "United Kingdom" |
         `Country` == "China") %>%
  PACF(Arrivals) %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Composite plot of time series decomposition


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  gg_tsdisplay(Arrivals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Visual STL Diagnostics
### Visual STL diagnostics with feasts



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  model(stl = STL(Arrivals)) %>%
  components() %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



### Classical Decomposition with feasts


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(`Country` == "Vietnam") %>%
  model(
    classical_decomposition(
      Arrivals, type = "additive")) %>%
  components() %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Visual Forecasting
### Time Series Data Sampling


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_ts <- tsibble_longer %>%
  filter(Country == "Vietnam") %>% 
  mutate(Type = if_else(
    `Month-Year` >= "2019-01-01", 
    "Hold-out", "Training"))
vietnam_train <- vietnam_ts %>%
  filter(`Month-Year` < "2019-01-01")
```
:::




### Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Time Series Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_train %>%
  model(stl = STL(Arrivals)) %>%
  components() %>%
  autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-22-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Fitting forecasting models


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_ses <- vietnam_train %>%
  model(ETS(Arrivals ~ error("A") 
            + trend("N") 
            + season("N")))
fit_ses
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A mable: 1 x 2
# Key:     Country [1]
  Country `ETS(Arrivals ~ error("A") + trend("N") + season("N"))`
  <chr>                                                   <model>
1 Vietnam                                            <ETS(A,N,N)>
```


:::
:::


#### Examine Model Assumptions


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gg_tsresiduals(fit_ses)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-24-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


#### The model details


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_ses %>%
  report()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Series: Arrivals 
Model: ETS(A,N,N) 
  Smoothing parameters:
    alpha = 0.9998995 

  Initial states:
     l[0]
 10312.99

  sigma^2:  27939164

     AIC     AICc      BIC 
2911.726 2911.913 2920.374 
```


:::
:::


#### Trend method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_H <- vietnam_train %>%
  model(`Holt's method` = 
          ETS(Arrivals ~ error("A") +
                trend("A") + 
                season("N")))
vietnam_H %>% report()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Series: Arrivals 
Model: ETS(A,A,N) 
  Smoothing parameters:
    alpha = 0.9998995 
    beta  = 0.0001004625 

  Initial states:
     l[0]     b[0]
 13673.29 525.8859

  sigma^2:  28584805

     AIC     AICc      BIC 
2916.695 2917.171 2931.109 
```


:::
:::


#### Damped Trend Method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vietnam_HAd <- vietnam_train %>%
  model(`Holt's method` = 
          ETS(Arrivals ~ error("A") +
                trend("Ad") + 
                season("N")))
vietnam_HAd %>% report()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Series: Arrivals 
Model: ETS(A,Ad,N) 
  Smoothing parameters:
    alpha = 0.9998999 
    beta  = 0.0001098602 
    phi   = 0.9784562 

  Initial states:
     l[0]   b[0]
 13257.28 523.54

  sigma^2:  28641536

     AIC     AICc      BIC 
2917.921 2918.593 2935.218 
```


:::
:::


#### Result


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gg_tsresiduals(vietnam_H)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-28-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gg_tsresiduals(vietnam_HAd)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-29-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
